aiReporting.placeholder: Ask a question about your business data...
aiReporting.emptyPlaceholderBody: Start with a question about your business data and I will help you with a useful answer.
aiReporting.noPermissionToSend: You do not have permission to use AI Reporting.
aiReporting.disabledByAdmin: AI Reporting is disabled by administration.
aiReporting.disabledBody: This feature has been disabled by administration. Contact an admin to enable it in General Administration.
aiReporting.aiWarning: AI can make mistakes. Verify important information.
aiReporting.footerHint: Enter to send, Shift+Enter for a new line.
aiReporting.deleteChatConfirm: This will remove "{{name}}" from your chat history.
